posts.name: Matt’s Big Breakfast
posts.note: Matt’s Big Breakfast is a contemporary American cafe serving daytime fare, including breakfast, burgers, and sandwiches. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Mrs White's Golden Rule Cafe
posts.note: Mrs. White's Golden Rule Cafe is a modest, family-owned eatery serving home-style Southern and soul food seven days a week since the '60s. The dish to order from what I've heard is the smothered chicken fried steak along with the mac and cheese or deep-fried pork chops.

posts.name: Over Easy
posts.note: Over Easy is a local chain serving omelets, pancakes, and other breakfast classics in cheery, retro surrounds. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Tacos Chiwas
posts.note: Tacos Chiwas is a family owned restaurant focused on providing quality, excellent service, and preparing fresh food from recipes that have been passed down through generations. Order the rajas gordita which is the holy matrimony of steam and spice, a pliable pillow of puffed dough with a creamy core of beans, cheese and chiles that warms your fingers, burns your lips and buckles your knees with its disarmingly tender texture or the smoked beef cheek Barbacoa Tacos and the smoked brisket Deshebrada Roja Gorditas.
